Class EventDrivenUpdatesListener

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.encoway.edu.EventDrivenUpdatesListener
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    EventListener, javax.faces.event.ComponentSystemEventListener, javax.faces.event.FacesListener, javax.faces.event.SystemEventListener

    @ApplicationScoped
public class EventDrivenUpdatesListener
extends Object
implements javax.faces.event.SystemEventListener, javax.faces.event.ComponentSystemEventListener

    SystemEventListener mapping event names to registered UIComponent’s IDs.
